movies.name: Limitless
movies.plot: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard.

movies.name: The Conjuring
movies.plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movies.name: Paranormal Activity
movies.plot: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

movies.name: Black Widow
movies.plot: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

movies.name: Blade Runner 2049
movies.plot: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.name: Iron Man
movies.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.name: Free Guy
movies.plot: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

movies.name: Dune
movies.plot: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most vital element in the galaxy.

movies.name: Oblivion
movies.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

movies.name: Edge of Tomorrow
movies.plot: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

movies.name: Sightseers
movies.plot: Chris wants to show girlfriend Tina his world, but events soon conspire against the couple and their dream caravan holiday takes a very wrong turn.

movies.name: Terminator Genysis
movies.plot: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

movies.name: Allegiant
movies.plot: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the truth.

movies.name: The 5th Wave
movies.plot: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth in ruin. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

movies.name: City of Ember
movies.plot: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing.

movies.name: Reign of Fire
movies.plot: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

movies.name: The Time Machine
movies.plot: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future.

movies.name: Blue Valentine
movies.plot: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

movies.name: Ride Along
movies.plot: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

movies.name: Victoria
movies.plot: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly.

movies.name: The Beaver
movies.plot: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communication.

movies.name: Tag
movies.plot: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

movies.name: It
movies.plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown.

movies.name: The NeverEnding Story
movies.plot: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

movies.name: Lady Bird
movies.plot: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.
